author: neilg
msg: when namespaces are enabled, we will now honour the namespace-validity constraint that states that attributes of type ID/IDREF/IDREFS must be NCNames

author: neilg
msg: in order to be namespace-valid, attributes of type ID/IDREF/IDREFS must be NCNames.  Thus, ValidationContext must be able to describe whether namespace processing is enabled.

author: neilg
msg: fix non-conformance to namespaces (1.0 and 1.1) with respect to ENTITY/NOTATION/PI names

author: neilg
msg: add a scanNCName function which may be used to scan names which are known must be NCNames
